card.name: Academy Rector
card.text: When Academy Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: AEther Sting
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, AEther Sting deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Ancient Silverback
card.text: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback.

card.name: Apprentice Necromancer
card.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

card.name: Archery Training
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on Archery Training. Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on Archery Training."

card.name: Attrition
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Aura Thief
card.text: Flying When Aura Thief dies, you gain control of all enchantments.

card.name: Blizzard Elemental
card.text: Flying {3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.

card.name: Bloodshot Cyclops
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Body Snatcher
card.text: When Body Snatcher enters the battlefield, exile it unless you discard a creature card. When Body Snatcher dies, exile Body Snatcher and return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Braidwood Cup
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Braidwood Sextant
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Braidwood Sextant: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Brass Secretary
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice Brass Secretary: Draw a card.

card.name: Brine Seer
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Bubbling Beebles
card.text: Bubbling Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an enchantment.

card.name: Bubbling Muck
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a Swamp for mana, that player adds {B} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Caltrops
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.

card.name: Capashen Knight
card.text: First strike {1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Capashen Standard
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {2}, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.

card.name: Capashen Templar
card.text: {W}: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Carnival of Souls
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life and add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chime of Night
card.text: Enchant creature When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Cinder Seer
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Cinder Seer deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Colos Yearling
card.text: Mountainwalk {R}: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Compost
card.text: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

card.name: Covetous Dragon
card.text: Flying When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.

card.name: Disappear
card.text: Enchant creature {U}: Return enchanted creature and Disappear to their owners' hands.

card.name: Disease Carriers
card.text: When Disease Carriers dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Donate
card.text: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.

card.name: Dying Wail
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, target player discards two cards.

card.name: Elvish Piper
card.text: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Emperor Crocodile
card.text: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

card.name: Encroach
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Eradicate
card.text: Exile target nonblack creature. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Extruder
card.text: Echo {4} Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: False Prophet
card.text: When False Prophet dies, exile all creatures.

card.name: Fatigue
card.text: Target player skips his or her next draw step.

card.name: Fend Off
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. Cycling {2}

card.name: Festering Wound
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on Festering Wound. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Festering Wound deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on Festering Wound.

card.name: Field Surgeon
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Flame Jet
card.text: Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player. Cycling {2}

card.name: Fledgling Osprey
card.text: Fledgling Osprey has flying as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Flicker
card.text: Exile target nontoken permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Fodder Cannon
card.text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Gamekeeper
card.text: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Goblin Berserker
card.text: First strike, haste

card.name: Goblin Festival
card.text: {2}: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.

card.name: Goblin Gardener
card.text: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.

card.name: Goblin Marshal
card.text: Echo {4}{R}{R} When Goblin Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Goblin Masons
card.text: When Goblin Masons dies, destroy target Wall.

card.name: Heart Warden
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.

card.name: Hulking Ogre
card.text: Hulking Ogre can't block.

card.name: Hunting Moa
card.text: Echo {2}{G} When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Illuminated Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. {2}, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.

card.name: Impatience
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't cast a spell this turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Incendiary
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Incendiary. When enchanted creature dies, Incendiary deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of fuse counters on Incendiary.

card.name: Iridescent Drake
card.text: Flying When Iridescent Drake enters the battlefield, put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to Iridescent Drake.

card.name: Ivy Seer
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Jasmine Seer
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Junk Diver
card.text: Flying When Junk Diver dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Keldon Champion
Keldon Vandals
card.text: Echo {2}{R} When Keldon Vandals enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Kingfisher
card.text: Flying When Kingfisher dies, draw a card.

card.name: Landslide
card.text: Sacrifice any number of Mountains. Landslide deals that much damage to target player.

card.name: Lurking Jackals
card.text: When an opponent has 10 or less life, if Lurking Jackals is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Hound creature.

card.name: Magnify
card.text: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mantis Engine
card.text: {2}: Mantis Engine gains flying until end of turn. {2}: Mantis Engine gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Mark of Fury
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. At the beginning of the end step, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.

card.name: Marker Beetles
card.text: When Marker Beetles dies, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.

card.name: Mask of Law and Grace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.

card.name: Master Healer
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Masticore
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.

card.name: Mental Discipline
card.text: {1}{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

card.name: Metalworker
card.text: {T}: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add {C}{C} to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Metathran Elite
card.text: Metathran Elite can't be blocked as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Metathran Soldier
card.text: Metathran Soldier can't be blocked.

card.name: Momentum
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on Momentum. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on Momentum.

card.name: Multani's Decree
card.text: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

card.name: Nightshade Seer
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Opalescence
card.text: Each other non-Aura enchantment is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an enchantment.

card.name: Opposition
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Pattern of Rebirth
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield. If that player does, he or she shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Phyrexian Monitor
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Phyrexian Monitor.

card.name: Phyrexian Negator
card.text: Trample Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

card.name: Plague Dogs
card.text: When Plague Dogs dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Plague Dogs: Draw a card.

card.name: Plow Under
card.text: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

card.name: Powder Keg
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg. {T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.

card.name: Private Research
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Private Research. When enchanted creature dies, draw a card for each page counter on Private Research.

card.name: Quash
card.text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Rapid Decay
card.text: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. Cycling {2}

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
card.text: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.

card.name: Reckless Abandon
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Reckless Abandon, sacrifice a creature. Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Reliquary Monk
card.text: When Reliquary Monk dies, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Repercussion
card.text: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Replenish
card.text: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Rescue
card.text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Forest you control.

card.name: Rofellos's Gift
card.text: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Sanctimony
card.text: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Scent of Brine
card.text: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Scent of Cinder
card.text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Scent of Ivy
card.text: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Scent of Jasmine
card.text: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Scent of Nightshade
card.text: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Scour
card.text: Exile target enchantment. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Scrying Glass
card.text: {3}, {T}: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.

card.name: Serra Advocate
card.text: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Sigil of Sleep
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Skittering Horror
card.text: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.

card.name: Slinking Skirge
card.text: Flying {2}, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.

card.name: Solidarity
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Soul Feast
card.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Sowing Salt
card.text: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Splinter
card.text: Exile target artifact. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Storage Matrix
card.text: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during his or her untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

card.name: Taunting Elf
card.text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.

card.name: Telepathic Spies
card.text: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: Temporal Adept
card.text: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tethered Griffin

card.name: Thieving Magpie
card.text: Flying Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Thran Dynamo
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Thran Foundry
card.text: {1}, {T}, Exile Thran Foundry: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Thran Golem
card.text: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

card.name: Treachery
card.text: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Twisted Experiment
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.

card.name: Urza's Incubator
card.text: As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Voice of Duty
card.text: Flying, protection from green

card.name: Voice of Reason
card.text: Flying, protection from blue

card.name: Wake of Destruction
card.text: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.

card.name: Wall of Glare
card.text: Defender Wall of Glare can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Yavimaya Elder
card.text: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Yavimaya Hollow
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.
